entry.title: Armenian president meets Saudi crown prince in historic visit

media:group.media:title: Armenian president meets Saudi crown prince in historic visit
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenian President Armen Sarkissian meets Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman al Saud, in the first visit of an Armenian official to the Saudi kingdom. üìçThe Vatican will open a Nunciature in Yerevan. üìçAfter a ruling party defeat in local elections, Armenia‚Äôs political forces prepare for a second round of local polls.

entry.title: ‚ÄúScience and Development are the new raw material for nations economic growth‚Äù

media:group.media:title: ‚ÄúScience and Development are the new raw material for nations economic growth‚Äù
media:group.media:description:
Pawan Kumar Chandana is the co-founder and CEO of Skyroot, an Indian private aerospace manufacturer and commercial launch service provider. He is in Armenia within the framework of the DigiWeek 2021 in Yerevan. A week with several panels dedicated to science-related topics.
Mr. Chandana talks with CivilNet‚Äôs Ani Paitjan about the importance for a country to keep its brains within its territories as Technologies, Science and Development are the precious resources of a nation for economic growth.

entry.title: CivilNet hosts Atlantic Council fellows and Armenian media representatives

media:group.media:title: CivilNet hosts Atlantic Council fellows and Armenian media representatives
media:group.media:description:
Representatives of the Atlantic Council, an American think-tank, were in downtown Yerevan to meet with CivilNet‚Äôs team as well as other Armenian media. Along with many other functions and meetings in Armenia, they will now go on to meet Armenia‚Äôs political leaders, to get their take on the current situation and ways to overcome existing issues.

entry.title: Armenia registers record number of covid deaths in single day

media:group.media:title: Armenia registers record number of covid deaths in single day
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia reports a record of 57 covid deaths in a single day. üìçMedia frenzy ensues over a rumoured Pashinyan-Aliyev-Putin meeting in November. üìçArmenia‚Äôs parliament holds a closed session regarding the issue of demarcating the border with Azerbaijan.

entry.title: Lessons from the Lithuanian Experience for Armenia

media:group.media:title: Lessons from the Lithuanian Experience for Armenia
media:group.media:description:
Inga Stanytƒó-Toloƒçkienƒó, the Lithuanian Ambassador to Armenia, speaks to CivilNet about how Lithuania supports Armenia‚Äôs democratization and reform processes, as well as the fight against Covid-19. Ambassador Stanytƒó-Toloƒçkienƒó also discusses Armenia‚Äôs and Lithuania‚Äôs trajectory since the collapse of the USSR, Lithuania‚Äôs views on the situation in Armenia, and the Lithuanian Embassy‚Äôs upcoming plans in Armenia.
